alert.note: Alert for Miami-Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 19 at 4:54PM EDT until June 21 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... ...REPLACES FLASH FLOOD WARNING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is occurring. * WHERE...A portion of southeast Florida, including the following county, Miami-Dade. * WHEN...Until 530 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 451 PM EDT, Trained weather spotters reported ongoing flooding in the area. Between 2 and 5 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are expected over the area. Any flooded waters will continue to gradually recede. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Miami, Hialeah, Kendall, Doral, Miami Springs, Sweetwater, University Park, Fountainbleau, Tamiami, Westchester, Olympia Heights, Sunset, Kendale Lakes, Miami International Airport, Virginia Gardens, Fiu South Campus, Tamiami Fairgrounds, Westwood Lakes, Kendall West and Allapattah. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
